objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#4B0082'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#663399'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#9370DB'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#BA55D3'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='url(#diagonalGrad2)'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='15' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='10' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='150' cy='300' r='12' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='15' fill='#4B0082'/><circle cx='900' cy='750' r='10' fill='#4B0082'/><circle cx='750' cy='900' r='12' fill='#4B0082'/></g><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.1'/><g transform='rotate(45 540 540)'><rect x='420' y='-100' width='2' height='1280' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/><rect x='660' y='-100' width='2' height='1280' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Non-Slip Design
• Breathable Mesh Fabric
• Slip-On Technology
• Multi-Sport Performance

product_details.description: Slip on design easy to wear, fashion colour with everything Non-slip Wear-resistant outsole Comfortable and breathable fabric Occasion: casual, walking, running,driving , training, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, workout and so on. Multi-color choose: Black, Brown, Dark Grey, Green Yellow, Blue, Orange, Pink, Purple, Rose Red Sole material - Thermoplastic Polyurethane ** Outer material - Mesh ** Closure type - Pull-On ** Water resistance level - Not Water Resistant **

banner_details:
This vibrant and modern banner design emphasizes an athletic sneaker product with a dynamic diagonal dual-tone purple gradient background. The layout features bold and futuristic typography for the main product title using two text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") positioned at the top left. Below that, the tagline ("tagline") uses a sleek condensed font in a soft lavender shade, separated by a decorative horizontal line ("decorative").

Supporting features are listed beneath in the "description" layer, while the price ("price") is prominently highlighted in large white font. The "cta" text layer ("SHOP NOW") appears over a rectangular lavender button ("cta_background"). A realistic image of purple sneakers ("product_image") is tilted upward and placed prominently near center-right, emphasizing motion and appeal.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Indigo: #4B0082
- Soft Plum: #663399
- Light Violet: #9370DB
- Orchid Purple: #BA55D3
- Lavender Rose: #E0B0FF
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of athletic shoes dominated by a vibrant purple hue, giving them a bold and energetic appearance. The primary color is a rich royal purple (#6A0DAD), accented by lighter shades such as lavender (#B894DE) on the text overlay. The sole features a striking contrast with white (#FFFFFF) and a touch of dark gray (#4B4B4B) for depth and dimension. These tones are seamlessly blended through gradients and material textures, creating a visually dynamic look. For an advertisement banner, using a palette of purple, lavender, white, and dark gray will emphasize the shoe's futuristic and sporty design.
